Text.Page:
Remain patient. Our secret foundry is still producing magical weapons, and they will be on their way to you soon.

In the meantime, stay alert! If those federation dogs find the teleportal, I am holding you responsible!

Even if they do, they still need one of our tokens to operate the portal, so make sure you keep those safe, as well!

If I find one of those federation scum has infiltrated our base, I will execute every last one of you.

This is your last warning.

- Tetra Aniask, servant of LokFold document.
